courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of music theory, including notation, scales, and chords.

courses.title: Guitar Basics
courses.description: A beginner's guide to playing the guitar, covering basic chords, strumming, and tuning.

courses.title: Vocal Training Essentials
courses.description: Develop vocal techniques, breathing exercises, and understanding of pitch and tone.

courses.title: Piano Fundametals
courses.description: Learn the basics of playing the piano, from hand positioning to simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Music Composition
courses.description: Explore advanced techniques for composing music, including melody development and orchestration.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Introduction to producing music electronically using software and digital instruments.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn the basics of jazz improvisation, including scales, phrasing, and harmonic understanding.

courses.title: Music History and Appreciation
courses.description: Explore the history of music from classical to modern-day genres and influential artists.

courses.title: Drum Techniques for Beginners
courses.description: Introduction to drumming techniques, including rhythm basics, hand control, and coordination.

courses.title: Songwriting Workshop
courses.description: Learn the essentials of songwriting, from lyrics and melody to structure and production.
